LOG_ACTION_V1.FILE_SHARE_WITH_ALERT_FOR_USD: File share sent with the Undownloaded Fileshare Alert activated
LOG_ACTION_V1.SHARE_WITH_USD_DOWNLOADED: All the files within the share have been downloaded

MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.FILE_WARN_OWNER_BEFORE_FILE_EXPIRY: A file is about to be deleted since it will reach its expiry date
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_NEW_CREATION: A new guest receives an activation link for his account
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK: A guest receives a reset link for his password
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_GUEST_ABOUT_HIS_PASSWORD_RESE: A guest account password was modified
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_OWNER_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRATION: A guest's account will expire soon
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_FOR_4_0: Change guest password due to security enhancement
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD: A recipient has downloaded the file share
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_SHARE_DELETED: A sender has deleted his file share
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_NEW_SHARE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_SEND: The sender receives a recap of his file shares
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_MODERATOR_UPDATE: Guest moderator role has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_NEW_SHARE_FOR_RECIPIENT: A recipient receives a file share link
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_BEFORE_EXPIRY: The file share of the sender is about to expire
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_SENDER_ABOUT_SHARE_EXPIRATION: A share will expire soon without being downloaded
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_ABOUT_EXPIRED_SHARE: The share has expired and was deleted by the system
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_ANONYMOUS_RESET_PASSWORD: The password of the anonymous share was reset
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_CREATOR: The issuer has closed the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_RECIPIENT: A recipient has closed the upload request of the creator
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_RECIPIENT: A recepient has deleted a file within the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_OWNER: A file was deleted by the issuer of the Upload Request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UNAVAILABLE_SPACE: A recipient could not upload his file due to insufficient space
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPLOADED_FILE: A recipient has uploaded a file within the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_BEFORE_EXPIRY: An upload request is about to be closed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_EXPIRY: An upload request has been closed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_OWNER: An upload request has been activated for the issuer
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_RECIPIENT: An upload request has been activated for the recipient
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_OWNER: The upload request has been closed by the issuer
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CREATED: An upload request has been created
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELTED_BY_OWNER: The upload request issuer deletes a file within the upload request.
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_RENEWAL: The password of the upload request was renewed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_REMOVED: The password of the upload request was deleted
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_REMINDER: Remind the recipient of the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPDATED_SETTINGS: The settings related to upload request was updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_RECIPIENT_REMOVED: A given contact in the Upload Request was removed
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_MEMBER: A user has been added to the workgroup
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER: The rights of a member on the workGroup has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER: A member was removed from the workGroup
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT: A new document has been added to the workgroup
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT_UPDATE: A workgroup document has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_C: A user receives a notification when an administrator creates a permanent access token (JWT) for his account
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_D: A user receives a notification when an administrator deletes a permanent access token (JWT) for his account
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER: A member was removed from the DRIVE
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER: A user has been added to the DRIVE
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER: The rights of a member on the DRIVE has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER: A member was removed from the Workspace
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER: A user has been added to the Workspace
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER: The rights of a member on the Workspace has been updated

_COMMENT:NAME_OF_THE_MAIL_ACTIVATION.NAME: This is the name of the mail activation in french or english
_COMMENT:NAME_OF_THE_MAIL_ACTIVATION.USE_EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 0 if there is no description for the notification, 1 to show just the description, 2 to show the description and the advanced description, 3 to load an external template
_COMMENT:NAME_OF_THE_MAIL_ACTIVATION.DESCRIPTION: The description of the mail activation type
_COMMENT:NAME_OF_THE_MAIL_ACTIVATION.ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION: advanced description of the mail activation

FILE_WARN_OWNER_BEFORE_FILE_EXPIRY.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.FILE_WARN_OWNER_BEFORE_FILE_EXPIRY
FILE_WARN_OWNER_BEFORE_FILE_EXPIRY.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the issuer of a file before the expiration and deletion by the system.

GUEST_ACCOUNT_NEW_CREATION.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_NEW_CREATION
GUEST_ACCOUNT_NEW_CREATION.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a new guest is created, it contains his credentials.

GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK
GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a guest password is reset.

GUEST_WARN_GUEST_ABOUT_HIS_PASSWORD_RESE.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_GUEST_ABOUT_HIS_PASSWORD_RESET
GUEST_WARN_GUEST_ABOUT_HIS_PASSWORD_RESE.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the guest, when his password was modified.

GUEST_WARN_OWNER_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRATION.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_OWNER_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRATION
GUEST_WARN_OWNER_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the guest's creator, when a guest account is about to expire.

GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_FOR_4_0.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_FOR_4_0
GUEST_ACCOUNT_RESET_PASSWORD_FOR_4_0.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to guests to reset their passwords due to security enhancement.

GUEST_MODERATOR_CREATION.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_MODERATOR_CREATION
GUEST_MODERATOR_CREATION.DESCRIPTION: A user receives an email notification when he is added to a guest moderators list

GUEST_MODERATOR_DELETION.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_MODERATOR_DELETION
GUEST_MODERATOR_DELETION.DESCRIPTION: A user receives an email notification when he is deleted from a guest moderators list

GUEST_MODERATOR_UPDATE.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_MODERATOR_UPDATE
GUEST_MODERATOR_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION: A user receives an email notification when his moderator role is updated

GUEST_WARN_MODERATOR_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRAT.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.GUEST_WARN_MODERATOR_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRATION
GUEST_WARN_MODERATOR_ABOUT_GUEST_EXPIRAT.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a guest account has expired

SHARE_ANONYMOUS_RESET_PASSWORD.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_ANONYMOUS_RESET_PASSWORD
SHARE_ANONYMOUS_RESET_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a new password is generated for an existing anonymous sharing.

SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD_ANONYMOUS.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD
SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD_ANONYMOUS.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to warn the share owner when an external user downloads a shared document.

SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD_USERS.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD
SHARE_FILE_DOWNLOAD_USERS.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the share owner when a internal user or a guest downloads the received shared documents.

SHARE_FILE_SHARE_DELETED.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_FILE_SHARE_DELETED
SHARE_FILE_SHARE_DELETED.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to share recipients when a shared document is deleted by the share owner.

SHARE_NEW_SHARE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_SEND.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_NEW_SHARE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_SENDER
SHARE_NEW_SHARE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_SEND.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the user who is creating a share with the option 'Acknowledgement of share creation' enabled. It contains the resume of the share.

SHARE_NEW_SHARE_FOR_RECIPIENT.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_NEW_SHARE_FOR_RECIPIENT
SHARE_NEW_SHARE_FOR_RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to all recipients (internal users, guests or external users) when a user shares a document.

SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_BEFORE_EXPIRY.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_BEFORE_EXPIRY
SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_BEFORE_EXPIRY.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to share recipients when a shared document is about to expire.

SHARE_WARN_UNDOWNLOADED_FILESHARES.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_UNDOWNLOADED_FILESHARES
SHARE_WARN_UNDOWNLOADED_FILESHARES.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the user who is creating a share with the option 'Undownloaded shared document alert' enabled. It contains the resume of downloaded shares.

SHARE_WARN_SENDER_ABOUT_SHARE_EXPIRATION.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_SENDER_ABOUT_SHARE_EXPIRATION_WITHOUT_DOWNLOAD
SHARE_WARN_SENDER_ABOUT_SHARE_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the share owner when his share will expire soon without being downloaded by the recipient.

SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_ABOUT_EXPIRED_SHARE.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_ABOUT_EXPIRED_SHARE
SHARE_WARN_RECIPIENT_ABOUT_EXPIRED_SHARE.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the share recipient when the share has been expired and deleted by the system.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_RECIPIENT.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_RECIPIENT
UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the internal user or guest when the upload request is closed by the recipient.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_OWNER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_OWNER
UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the internal user or guest when the upload request is activated.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_RECIPIENT.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_RECIPIENT
UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED_FOR_RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient when the upload request is activated.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_OWNER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_OWNER
UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient when the upload request is closed by the issuer.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_OWNER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_OWNER
UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient when a file is deleted from the upload request by the issuer.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_CREATED.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CREATED
UPLOAD_REQUEST_CREATED.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient when the upload request is created and not yet enabled.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_RENEWAL.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_RENEWAL
UPLOAD_REQUEST_PASSWORD_RENEWAL.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient to allow him to reset the upload request access password.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_RECIPIENT_REMOVED.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_RECIPIENT_REMOVED
UPLOAD_REQUEST_RECIPIENT_REMOVED.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient when the issuer removes him from the upload request.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_RECIPIENT.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_RECIPIENT
UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the issuer of an upload request when the recipient deletes files.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_REMINDER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_REMINDER
UPLOAD_REQUEST_REMINDER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to remind the recipient to upload a files on the upload request before it expires.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPDATED_SETTINGS.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPDATED_SETTINGS
UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPDATED_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the recipient of an upload request when parameters of the upload request have been updated.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_UNAVAILABLE_SPACE.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UNAVAILABLE_SPACE
UPLOAD_REQUEST_UNAVAILABLE_SPACE.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the issuer of an upload request when a recipient could not complete an upload due to the issuer insufficient space in his Personal Space.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPLOADED_FILE.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPLOADED_FILE
UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPLOADED_FILE.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to an internal user or a guest when an external user uploads a file into an upload request.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_BEFORE_EXPIRY.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_BEFORE_EXPIRY
UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_BEFORE_EXPIRY.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the issuer or recipient of an upload request before the expiration of the upload request.

UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_EXPIRY.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_EXPIRY
UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_EXPIRY.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to the issuer or recipient of an upload request when the upload request expires.

WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_MEMBER
WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a new workgroup member.

WORKGROUP_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER
WORKGROUP_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a workgroup member when his right was updated.

WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER
WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to members removed from the workgroup.

WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_WORKGROUP.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_WORKGROUP
WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_WORKGROUP.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a workgroup is deleted

WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT
WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a document has been added to the workgroup

WORKGROUP_WARN_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT_UPDATE.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_NEW_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT
WORKGROUP_WARN_WORKGROUP_DOCUMENT_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a workgroup document has been updated

WORKGROUP_COM_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORKGROUP_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER
WORKGROUP_COM_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a workgroup member, when he was removed from a workgroup.

ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_C.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_CREATED
ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_C.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a user when an administrator creates a permanent access token (JWT) for his account.

ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_D.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_DELETED
ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARN_JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN_D.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a user when an administrator deletes a permanent access token (JWT) for his account.

DRIVE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER
DRIVE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a DRIVE member is deleted.

DRIVE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER
DRIVE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when the new member is added to the DRIVE.

DRIVE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.DRIVE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER
DRIVE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a DRIVE member when his right was updated.

WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED
WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when a workspace is deleted

WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER
WORK_SPACE_WARN_DELETED_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a workspace member is deleted.

WORK_SPACE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER
WORK_SPACE_WARN_NEW_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent when the new member is added to the workspace.

WORK_SPACE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER.NAME: @:COMMON.ENUM.MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.WORK_SPACE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER
WORK_SPACE_WARN_UPDATED_MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: This notification is sent to a workspace member when his right was updated.

BOX_FORM.LEGEND_ENABLE_NOTVISIBLE: Warning there are some hidden parameters defined in this view. See advanced view for more details.
BOX_FORM.LEGEND_ENABLE: Warning, by modifying this field you will change the advanced settings.

SHARED_SPACE.NAME: Shared space
SHARED_SPACE.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users to access Shared Space. Shared Space contains Drives and Workgroups. A drive contains members with their roles and nested Workgroups. A Workgroup contains members with their roles and some content (folders/files/versions). When this functionality is not activated, the below sub-function will not work
SHARED_SPACE.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Users will be given access to the feature after enabled
SHARED_SPACE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: This parameter will decide whether admins of nested domains can change the default parameter or not

DRIVE__CREATION_RIGHT.NAME: Drive - Creation right
DRIVE__CREATION_RIGHT.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users and administrators to create Drives

WORK_SPACE__CREATION_RIGHT.NAME: Workspace - Creation right
WORK_SPACE__CREATION_RIGHT.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users and administrators to create Workspaces

WORK_GROUP__CREATION_RIGHT.NAME: Workgroup - Creation right
WORK_GROUP__CREATION_RIGHT.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users to create standalone Workgroups

WORK_GROUP__FILE_EDITION.NAME: File edition right
WORK_GROUP__FILE_EDITION.DESCRIPTION: NB: This functionality depends on the versioning functionality, it should not be enabled if VERSIONING functionality is disabled

WORK_GROUP__FILE_VERSIONING.NAME: File versioning right
WORK_GROUP__FILE_VERSIONING.DESCRIPTION: If enable, it will let users to create and manage versions of a document in a workgroup

WORK_GROUP__DOWNLOAD_ARCHIVE.NAME: Archive download right
WORK_GROUP__DOWNLOAD_ARCHIVE.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users and administrators to download a directory in zip format.
WORK_GROUP__DOWNLOAD_ARCHIVE.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: This parameter contains the maximal size of the archive to download, it can be edited relating to need, (manage with precaution).

UPLOAD_REQUEST.NAME: Upload request
UPLOAD_REQUEST.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: URL to external upload request UI

UPLOAD_REQUEST__NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE.NAME: Upload request - email notification language
UPLOAD_REQUEST__NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Setting the email notification's default language.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow user to edit notification's language.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE.DELEGATION_POLICY: Allow administrator to change the default language.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__NOTIFICATION_LANGUAGE.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Choose a default langage. Initial value : en

UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.NAME: Ulpload request - Delay before activation
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.DESCRIPTION: The delay between the upload request's creation date and the activation date (upload request is available and users can upload documents)
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled this fucntionality allows user to set a delay before activating the upload request
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an administrator to change the default value parameter.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once enabled issuers can change delay before activation.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_ACTIVATION.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Choose the value of the delay. Adviced values: 0 day - available units: day / week / month

UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.NAME: Ulpload request - Delay before expiration
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION:
The delay between the activation date and the expiry date.

 Ex: if an Upolad Request is activated on 3 January and the delay before expiration is 2 days, the expiry date will be 6 January at 00h00.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled user can set a delay before expiration.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an administrator to change the default value parameter.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.DELEGATION_POLICY: Allow issuer to change the value of delay before expiration.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_EXPIRATION.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Choose the value of the delay. Adviced values: 7 days - available units: day / week / month

UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.NAME: Upload request - maximum file count
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.DESCRIPTION: allow to set a limit for the number of documents that can be uploaded, within the limit of the whole quota size of the upload request.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled, number of documents can be limited.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an admininstrator to edit the default parameter value.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_COUNT.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once enabled, issuer can change the uploaded documents's number limit.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.NAME: Upload request - Maximum file size
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows to set a limit for every file size that can be uploaded, within the limit of deposit size
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled, the size of every uploaded file will be limited.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an administrator to change the default value parameter.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once enabled, issuer can change the uploaded files's size limit.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_FILE_SIZE.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Default value that administrator define and that'll be used or changed by the issuer.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.NAME: Upload request - Maximum deposit size
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows to define a maximum size for the whole upload request deposit.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled the deposit size will be limited
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an administrator to change default value parameter.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__MAXIMUM_DEPOSIT_SIZE.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once enabled, issuer can set the limit size of deposit.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.NAME: Upload request - Protected by password URL
UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows to secure the shared access URL's by a generated password (which is sent by mail for each recipient).
UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled, issuer will be able to protect URL's by a password.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an administrator to change default value parameter.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once enabled, sub-domain's administrators can make changes.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Default value: not protected by password

UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.NAME: Upload request - Closure right
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once activated, user can close the upload request if it's not expired
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Allow an administrator of a subdomain to update default configuration.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.DELEGATION_POLICY: Allow a user to give or not a recipient (external) the right to close an upload request.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Default value at upload request creation.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.NAME: Upload request - Recipient delete right
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.DESCRIPTION: The recipient of an upload request will be able to delete documents.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled, this will allow recipients to delete documents from the upload request deposit.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: By enabling configuration you allow an administrator to edit default configuration.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once enabled, allows issuer can give or not the recipient the right to delete documents.

UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.NAME: Upload request - Delay before notification
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows to manage the delay before sending a notification (to issuer and recipient) about upload request expiration
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once enabled, notification will be sent before the expiration.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: By enabling configuration you allow an administrator to edit default configuration.
UPLOAD_REQUEST__DELAY_BEFORE_NOTIFICATIO.DELEGATION_POLICY: Allow issuer to enable sending notification before upload request expiration.

ANONYMOUS_URL.NAME: Anonymous URL
ANONYMOUS_URL.DESCRIPTION: The functionality enables users to share documents with anonymous users (internal/external) through email. Those users does not have a Linshare account.
ANONYMOUS_URL.ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION: Enabling this functionality allows you to protect the anonymous share with a password. This protection is forced if the value is set to 'Required'. It is also possible to leave the choice to the user by specifying a default value 'allowed'
ANONYMOUS_URL.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once activated, the user can share a file with an anonymous user.
ANONYMOUS_URL.DELEGATION_POLICY: By enabling delegation you leave the choice to the user to use it with specifying a default value.

GUESTS__RESTRICTED.NAME: Contacts restriction
GUESTS__RESTRICTED.DESCRIPTION: You can restrict guests to share only with a restricted and personnal list of emails. By default, the guest will be restricted to his owner.

GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION.NAME: Postpone guest expiry date
GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION.DESCRIPTION: Allow internal users to edit and postpone the expiry date of a guest

INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.NAME: Enable personal space for internal users.
INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users in your domain can access menu Myspace. My space is a personal space where user can upload his documents and share with other users/work space
INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.USER_OVERRIDE: By enabling, nested admin can re-enable the Configure functionality toggle and then change the default parameter
INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: By enabling, you allow your nested domain admin to change default parameter field in his domain
INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: This setting decides when a new user is created, he can use Myspace by default or not

UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT.NAME: Undownloaded shared document alert
UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT.DESCRIPTION: By enabling this functionality, users will have the opportunity to get notified when a document has not been downloaded following a share. That notification is sent if at least one document of the share has not been downloaded at all.
UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT.DELEGATION_POLICY: Allow user to modify the default value for activation checkbox in share from

UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT__DUR.NAME: Undownloaded shared document alert - Days before the alert
UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT__DUR.DESCRIPTION: This is the default number of worked days (weekend are excluded) between now and the alert notification.
UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT__DUR.PARAMETER_NAME: Default activation checkbox value in share form

ANONYMOUS_URL__FORCE_ANONYMOUS_SHARING.NAME: Anonymous URL - force anonymous sharing process
ANONYMOUS_URL__FORCE_ANONYMOUS_SHARING.DESCRIPTION: By Enabling this functionality, the user can choose to share documents only with Anonymous Url. In this case, the internal users will not see the shared document in the Received Share Menu
ANONYMOUS_URL__FORCE_ANONYMOUS_SHARING.PARAMETER_NAME: Default activation checkbox value in share form

ANONYMOUS_URL__HIDE_RECEIVED_SHARE_MENU.NAME: Hide Received Shares menu
ANONYMOUS_URL__HIDE_RECEIVED_SHARE_MENU.DESCRIPTION: By Enabling this functionality, internal users will not have the access to the Received Share menu

ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION.NAME: Anonymous download notification
ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Anonymous download notification will be sent for every download or only for the first.

JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.NAME: JWT permanent token
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users and administrators to create, use and delete JWT permanent tokens
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once activated, users will be able to authenticate using a permanent token. Creation and manipulation will be handled by the delegation policy.
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: Once enabled, the administrator will be able to create JWT permanent tokens for a user account.
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: This parameter decides whether an admin can create permanent token for users in his domains

JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN__USER_MANAGEMENT.NAME: JWT permanent token for user
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN__USER_MANAGEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This functionality allows users to manage their JWT permanent tokens
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN__USER_MANAGEMENT.ACTIVATION_POLICY: Once activated, the user will be able to view and delete his tokens. The creation will be handled by the delegation parameter.
JWT_PERMANENT_TOKEN__USER_MANAGEMENT.DELEGATION_POLICY: Once activated, the user will be able to create his own authentication tokens.

SECOND_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION.NAME: Second factor authentication
SECOND_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION.DESCRIPTION: The functionality manages second factor authentication feature. Any changes of this page will have impact on all users of LinShare

COLLECTED_EMAILS_EXPIRATION.NAME: Collected emails expiration
COLLECTED_EMAILS_EXPIRATION.CONFIGURATION_POLICY: By enabling, you allow your nested domain admin to change collected emails uptime in his domain
COLLECTED_EMAILS_EXPIRATION.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: The duration of storing a collected email from the last time that email is used for sharing files

PARAMETERS.CONTACTS_LIST__CREATION_RIGHT__BOOLEAN_f: The user cannot create a contact list
PARAMETERS.CONTACTS_LIST__CREATION_RIGHT__BOOLEAN_t: The user can create a contact list
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__RESTRICTED__BOOLEAN_false: The guest will not be restricted.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__RESTRICTED__BOOLEAN_true: The guest will be restricted to a list of emails.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__CAN_UPLOAD__BOOLEAN_false: The guest will not have the deposit right by default.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__CAN_UPLOAD__BOOLEAN_true: The guest will have the deposit right by default.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION__B: The user can not extend the expiration date of a guest.
The user can extend the expiration date of a guest.
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__BOOLEAN_false: The anonymous shares will not be secured by a password when created.
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__BOOLEAN_true: The anonymous shares will be secured by a password when created.
PARAMETERS.SHARE_EXPIRATION__DELETE_FILE_ON_EXPIRAT: The document will not be removed at the expiration of the last share.
The document will be removed at the expiration of the last share.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE__BOOLEAN_false: The recipient can not close the upload request.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE__BOOLEAN_true: The recipient can close the upload request.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE__BOOLEAN_fals: The recipient can not delete files.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROLONGATION__BOOLEAN_fa: The sender will not postpone the expiry date.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROLONGATION__BOOLEAN_tr: The sender will postpone the expiry date.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROTECTED_BY_PASSWORD__B: The access to the invitation will not be protected by a password.
The access to the invitation will be protected by a password.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__GROUPED_MODE__BOOLEAN_fa: An invitation will be created per recipient.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__GROUPED_MODE__BOOLEAN_tr: All recipients share the conditions of use of the invitation.
PARAMETERS.SHARE_CREATION_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_OWNER: No acknowledgement will be sent to the issuer of the share.
An acknowledgement will be sent to the issuer of the share.
PARAMETERS.UNDOWNLOADED_SHARED_DOCUMENTS_ALERT__BOO: The undownloaded shared document alert is deactivated
The undownloaded shared document alert is activated
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION__BOOLEAN_fal: Notification will be sent for the first download only.
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__NOTIFICATION__BOOLEAN_tru: Notification will be sent for every download.
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__FORCE_ANONYMOUS_SHARING__: Anonymous Sharing with all users(internal and guests)
Anonymous Sharing with only anonymous users
PARAMETERS.WORK_GROUP__FILE_VERSIONING__BOOLEAN_fal: Versioning will be disabled by default when creating a new workgroup.
PARAMETERS.WORK_GROUP__FILE_VERSIONING__BOOLEAN_tru: Versioning will be enabled by default when creating a new workgroup.
PARAMETERS.SECOND_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION__BOOLEAN_tr: The second factor authentication will be required for all users
PARAMETERS.SECOND_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION__BOOLEAN_fa: The second factor authentication can be enabled by users (optional)
PARAMETERS.INTERNAL_ENABLE_PERSONAL_SPACE__BOOLEAN_: Internal user can access to his personal space.
The personal space will be disabled for internal user.
PARAMETERS.FUNCTIONALITIES.PARAMETERS.JWT_PERMANENT: Admin can create JWT token for users in his domains
Admin cannot create JWT token for users in his domains

SCRUTINY.SEARCH_LEGEND: Find a person's accounts by giving his email address
SCRUTINY.LDAP_HEADER_LABEL: Presence of the user in the LDAP
SCRUTINY.DATABASE_HEADER_LABEL: Presence of the user in the database
SCRUTINY.GUEST_HEADER_LABEL: Whether the user is a guest
SCRUTINY.WARNING_OUT_OF_DATE_REFRESH: The displayed data are no longer uptodate

BOX_MEMBERS_LIST.TITLE: Members list
BOX_MEMBERS_LIST.DESCRIPTION: You can add members to the group using the search box below. You can search by name, surname and email, you can simply select the member.

DOMAIN_SHARED_QUOTA.DESCRIPTION: Activation of this mode exempt from setting each container's quota of this domain (Personal Space and Shared Space). The user will see global consumption of all users of the domain.
DOMAIN_SHARED_QUOTA.LABEL: Activate Domain shared Quota

QUOTA.DISTRIBUTION: Current domain allocated quota distribution{{value ? ': ' + value : ''}}

SPACE.DOMAIN: Current domain used space{{value ? ': ' + value + ' (P.S. + S.S.)': ''}}

CLICK.PERSONAL_SPACE: Click to override the Personal space default value
CLICK.SHARED_SPACE: Click to override the Sharedspace default value

TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_ACCOUNT_QUOTA: Initialization quota structure for all existing accounts (users and workgroups)
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_CLEANUP_OLD_ACCOUNT: Cleanup old quota structure for all existing accounts
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_THREAD_TO_WORKGROUP: Generation of the new workgroup architecture
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_DOMAIN_POLICIES_UUID: Uuid generation for domains policies instead of identifier/label
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_DOMAIN_UUID: Uuid generation for domains instead of identifier/label
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_DOMAIN_QUOTA_SUBDOMAINS: Initialization quota structure (domain quota and container quota) for all sub-domains
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_DOMAIN_QUOTA_TOPDOMAINS: Initialization quota structure (domain quota and container quota) for all top-domains
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_0_SHA256SUM: Compute sha256sum for all stored document (this value may be undefined)
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_1_DOCUMENT_GARBAGE_COLLECTOR: Add all documents UUID in DocumentGarbageCollector
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_1_COMPUTE_USED_SPACE_FOR_WORGR: Compute all used space for every workgroups
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_1_REMOVE_ALL_THREAD_ENTRIES: Removal of all useless data related to old threads/groups in LinShare 1.x.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_1_COMPUTE_CURRENT_VALUE_FOR_DO: Compute used space by each domain
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_1_COMPUTE_TOP_AND_ROOT_DOMAIN_: Compute used space by sub-domains for top-domains and root-domain
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_1_ADD_ALL_NEW_MIME_TYPE: Update the list of supported mime types. (adding new ones).
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_MIGRATE_UPLOAD_PROPOSITION_F: Migrating file upload proposition filters to a new structure in the MongoDB database.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_MIGRATE_UPLOAD_PROPOSITION_T: Migrating file upload proposition in a new structure in the MongoDB database.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_MIGRATE_UPLOAD_REQUEST_HISTO: Migration of the old upload requests history into the new audit in the MongoDB database.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_MIGRATE_THREAD_AND_THREAD_ME: Migrating workgroups and their members to the new structure in the MongoDB database.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_GENERATE_BASIC_STATISTICS_FR: Generation of statistics from the traces of the audit (retroactive processing).
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_MIGRATE_WORKGROUP_AUDIT_TO_S: Migrating workGroup audit to new structure in the MongoDB database.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_2_MIGRATE_WORKGROUP_MEMBER_AUD: Migrating the workGroup member audit into a new structure in the MongoDB database.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_3_ADD_ALL_NEW_MIME_TYPE: Update the list of supported mime types. (adding new ones).
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_3_UPDATE_DOCUMENT_STRUCTURE_FO: Update workgroup documents to support the versionning structure.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_3_UPDATE_SHARED_SPACE_NODE_STR: Update sharedSpace nodes to support the versionning structure.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_3_MIGRATE_PERMANENT_TOKEN_ENTI: Update the permanent token entity structure.
TASKS.UPGRADE_2_3_ADD_QUOTA_UUID_TO_ALL_SHARED: Add the quota information to sharedSpaces.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_0_UPDATE_TARGET_DOMAIN_UUID_MA: Add the domain information to mail attachment's audit traces.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_0_ADD_ALL_NEW_MIME_TYPE: Update the list of supported mime types. (adding new ones).
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_0_PASSWORD_ENCODING_STRATEGY_C: Update the password encoding strategy for guests.
Update the password encoding strategy for anonymous.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_1_ADD_ALL_NEW_MIME_TYPE: Update the list of supported mime types. (adding new ones)
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_COMPUTE_CURRENT_VALUE_FOR_DO: Update the current value for domains.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_COMPUTE_TOP_AND_ROOT_DOMAIN_: Update top and root domain's quota.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_UPDATE_SYSTEM_TO_ANONYMOUS_A: Replace the systemAccount by anonymousAccount on audit traces for anonymous shares.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_ADD_WORKGROUP_UUID_AS_RELATE: Audit: Fix issue with missing links between workgroups and all related sharedSpace nodes (files, folders, revisions) traces.
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_ADD_SEE_AS_NESTED_FIELD_TO_S: Update structure of shareSpace members (new field 'nested' added).
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_UPDATE_SEE_AS_NESTED_FIELD_I: Update structure of shareSpace members (new field 'seeAsNested' added).
TASKS.UPGRADE_4_2_ADD_MISSING_PROPERTIES_TO_WO: Add missing properties(hasTumbnail, Sha256sum) to workgroup nodes.
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_0_AUDIT_RENAME_DRIVE_TO_WORK_S: Rename all DRIVE audit traces to WORKSPACE.
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_0_RENAME_WORKGROUP_DELETION_TO: Rename audit trace WORKGROUP_DELETION to WORK_GROUP_DELETION.
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_0_RENAME_DRIVE_DELETION_TO_WOR: Rename audit trace DRIVE_DELETION to WORK_SPACE_DELETION.
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_0_RENAME_DRIVE_MEMBERS_TO_WORK: Rename DRIVE members to workSpace members.
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_1_ADD_INTERNAL_ACCOUNT_TYPE_TO: Adds an account type to shared space members (with value: INTERNAL)
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_1_ADD_GUEST_ACCOUNT_TYPE_TO_SH: Adds an account type to shared space guests (with value: GUEST)
TASKS.UPGRADE_5_1_RENAME_WORKGROUP_TO_WORK_GRO: Renames WORKGROUP to WORK_GROUP in shared space node audit entries.
TASKS.OPTIONAL_POPULATE_EXTERNAL_FAVOURITE_REC: Optional task, populating favourite recipient to be anonymized by the GDPR process.
